page.title: 19LOCAL NEWS Festival Fringe
page.content: {Edinburgh Festival Fringe Comes to {Portobello.} This summer Portobello is to have its own{"Fringe At The Seaside"}(FATS for short) on Saturday 17th August.Shows of all kinds will start at 2pm and run until late evening. A number of well known fringe groups have been booked and many others will be encouraged to come down to the beach to perform. However the bulk of the entertainment will be organised and presented by local people.{The Joppa Kids}will have a face painting stall, the{Portobello {Ceildh Band}will provide some of the music and some offshore activities are planned by the{Portobello Water Ski {Club.}Other attractions include Street Theatre, a Busking Prize, a Street Market, a Children's Art Show, a Sandcastle Competion and Puppet Shows.
